name: createVappTemplateSnapshotExport
description: Export a vApp template snapashot to a catalog. Use the options endpoint to confirm that exporting to the catalog defaults or the original organization vDC storage profile is possible.

snapshot_id.description: ID assigned to a vApp snapshot object.

body.description: Configuration for a request to export a vApp template snapshot to a specific catalog.

$ul: **endTime**: The end time of the request.
**message**: The error message for failed IDs.
**id**: The ID of the request object used to poll the status.
**nodeId**: The ID of the node where the job ran.
**progress**: The current percentage progress of the asynchronous request.
**startTime**: The start time of the request.
